text: Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la shi yun man man yidong, ranhou shi qi jiehe, ranhou shi qi jiju, ranhou, ni jiu kanjian yu cong yun zhong jiangxia. Ta cong tiankong, cong rushan de yunceng nei jiangxia bingbao, jie ci chengfa tasuo yiyu zhe, bi kai tasuo yiyu zhe. Shandian jihu duo zoule shijue.
